page.title: 06LUNAN AREA TRADE SERVICES.
page.content: SHOPPING IN THE LUNAN AREA There are no shops in this area and the last general mobile shop to serve this area ceased to operate earlier this year. There is however a daily delivery of milk and the milk man will also supply other dairy products and daily newspapers on request. Twice weekly a fish van from Gourdon delivers fresh fish. The nearest shop is in Inverkeilor village, approximately 2 miles away, where there is a combined general store and post office. For other shops and supermarkets the indigenous population have to travel to Arbroath or Montrose. LIBRARY SERVICE. The mobile library service visits this area every two weeks and is well used.
